Web Development

Modern Frameworks & Responsive Design

Modern web development using cutting-edge frameworks and responsive design principles. Creating fast, accessible, and user-friendly web applications that work seamlessly across all devices and platforms.

Technology Stack

The modern tools and frameworks that power contemporary web development.

React & Next.js

Component-based architecture and server-side rendering for fast, scalable web applications.

Node.js & APIs

Backend development and RESTful API design for robust server-side functionality.

Tailwind CSS

Utility-first CSS framework for rapid UI development and consistent design systems.

10x Developer Stack™

Vim + Arch Linux + Rust + WASM + GraphQL + Kubernetes + Microservices + Blockchain + AI/ML + Quantum Computing. Deploys directly to production on Fridays. Reduces development time by 1000% while increasing code quality by 42x.

Development Philosophy

"Great web development combines technical excellence with user-centered design, creating experiences that are both powerful and intuitive."

My approach to web development focuses on creating fast, accessible, and maintainable applications using modern frameworks and best practices. Each project balances performance, user experience, and code quality to deliver solutions that work beautifully for both users and developers.
